scripts.postinstall: npm run create-dirs && npm run symlink-data
scripts.create-dirs: ([ -d data ] || mkdir data) && ([ -d dist ] || mkdir dist)
scripts.symlink-data: ([ -d app/data ] || ln -s `pwd`/data app/data) && ([ -d dist/data ] || ln -s `pwd`/data dist/data)
scripts.block-explorer: gulp find-users && gulp find-blocks && gulp publish-blocks
